Well that's the question, what does he just do? And that's all I was really trying to ask. You and I both watched Clinton and Trump speeches without media bias and simply came to different conclusions. You and I both, as well as plenty of other Americans, put in the research to lead us to choose who we voted for as president. I was hoping for more actually related to his business and Trump News than Clinton coming up again. Trump is the president elect so I was wondering about him. Maybe you assume I'm tugging at some strings or something, but I was just looking for more on the business aspect. Thanks though.

Ending the seal hunt will destroy a part of Newfoundland's culture. These seals are killed in a quick and painless way. Idk about you guys but have you seen the videos on how they slaughter cows and chickens? Only adult seals are hunted and never the younger babies. These seals are overpopulated and are destroying our ecosystem as it is. Getting rid of the seal hunt would only create more problems. Paul McCartney said that he seen the slaughter first hand out on the ice, but all newfoundlanders know for a fact he never did go out there, he was actually at a studio in p.e.i.
